title: Platform Fields

fields.label: Section Controls
fields.name: platform_section_controls
fields.instructions: Show or hide sections on the platform page

sub_fields.label: Hero Section
sub_fields.name: hero_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the hero section

sub_fields.label: Description Section
sub_fields.name: description_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the top description section

sub_fields.label: Video Section
sub_fields.name: video_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the video player section

sub_fields.label: Statistics Section
sub_fields.name: statistics_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the statistics section

sub_fields.label: Benefits Section
sub_fields.name: benefits_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the benefits cards section

sub_fields.label: Features Section
sub_fields.name: features_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the features section

sub_fields.label: Timeline/Architecture Section
sub_fields.name: timeline_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the timeline section

sub_fields.label: Industry Section
sub_fields.name: industry_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the industry section

sub_fields.label: Testimonials Section
sub_fields.name: working_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the testimonials section

sub_fields.label: Bottom CTA Section
sub_fields.name: bottom_cta_section_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Show or hide the bottom CTA buttons section

fields.label: Hero Background Type
fields.name: platform_background_type
fields.instructions: Choose whether to use a video or image as the hero background

fields.label: Hero Background Image
fields.name: platform_background_image
fields.instructions: Background image for the hero section (also used as fallback for video on mobile)

fields.label: Hero Background Video
fields.name: platform_background_video
fields.instructions: Upload MP4 video for hero background (recommended: 1920x1080, under 5MB for best performance)

fields.label: Platform Description
fields.name: platform_description
fields.instructions: Description of the platform (used as excerpt)

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: platform_button_text
fields.instructions: Text for the platform button (link will automatically use the platform's permalink)

fields.label: Platform Short Name
fields.name: platform_short_name
fields.instructions: Short name/acronym for the platform (e.g., BPA, BMNP)

fields.label: Go Beyond Section Tag
fields.name: video_section_tag
fields.instructions: Tag text above the video title

fields.label: Go Beyond Section Title
fields.name: video_section_title
fields.instructions: Title for the video section

fields.label: Go Beyond Section Description
fields.name: video_section_description
fields.instructions: Description for the video section
fields.default_value: Our very first platform – BPA – is more than your average policy administration platform. By deploying BPA, insurers and MGAs gain simplicity and efficiency, as well as the ability to quickly and smoothly launch new products and adapt to new requirements as their businesses grow.

fields.label: Video Title
fields.name: video_title
fields.instructions: Title of the video
fields.default_value: ChainThat Leadership Bytes ft Jai Prakash

fields.label: Video Description
fields.name: video_description
fields.instructions: Description of the video
fields.default_value: In this #LeadershipBytes episode, Jai Prakash Jhankal (AVP – Program Manager) shares how the team turned pressure into performance — delivering a 99.7% migration in just 3 days.

fields.label: Video Desktop Cover Image
fields.name: video_desktop_cover
fields.instructions: Desktop cover image for the video

fields.label: Video Mobile Cover Image
fields.name: video_mobile_cover
fields.instructions: Mobile cover image for the video

fields.label: Video URL
fields.name: video_url
fields.instructions: YouTube or Vimeo video URL

fields.label: Video Button Text
fields.name: video_button_text
fields.instructions: Text for the video button

fields.label: Benefits Tag
fields.name: benefits_tag
fields.instructions: Small tag text above the benefits heading (e.g., 'Your Key Benefits')

fields.label: Benefits Heading
fields.name: benefits_heading
fields.instructions: Main heading for the benefits section

fields.label: Benefit Items
fields.name: benefit_items
fields.instructions: Add benefit cards. The layout will automatically adjust to accommodate any number of cards.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Upload an icon image for this benefit (SVG or PNG recommended)

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Benefit card title

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: Benefit card description

fields.label: Statistics Title
fields.name: statistics_title
fields.instructions: Title for the statistics section

fields.label: Statistics Items
fields.name: statistics_items
fields.instructions: Add statistics items

sub_fields.label: Statistic Number
sub_fields.name: statistic_number
sub_fields.instructions: Number or text for the statistic

sub_fields.label: Statistic Description
sub_fields.name: statistic_description
sub_fields.instructions: Description of the statistic

fields.label: Capabilities Title
fields.name: capabilities_title
fields.instructions: Title for the capabilities section

fields.label: Capabilities Subtitle
fields.name: capabilities_subtitle
fields.instructions: Subtitle for the capabilities section
fields.default_value: What Beyond Policy Administration delivers – in detail.

fields.label: Capabilities Tabs
fields.name: capabilities_tabs
fields.instructions: Add capability tabs

sub_fields.label: Tab Name
sub_fields.name: tab_name
sub_fields.instructions: Name of the capability tab

sub_fields.label: Tab Background Image
sub_fields.name: tab_image
sub_fields.instructions: Full width background image for this tab (Desktop)

sub_fields.label: Tab Mobile Image
sub_fields.name: tab_mobile_image
sub_fields.instructions: Background image for mobile view

sub_fields.label: Tab Items
sub_fields.name: tab_items
sub_fields.instructions: Items for this tab

sub_fields.label: Item Icon
sub_fields.name: item_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Icon for the capability item

sub_fields.label: Item Title
sub_fields.name: item_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title of the capability item

sub_fields.label: Item Description
sub_fields.name: item_description
sub_fields.instructions: Description of the capability item

fields.label: Architecture Tag
fields.name: architecture_tag
fields.instructions: Tag text above the architecture title

fields.label: Architecture Title
fields.name: architecture_title
fields.instructions: Title for the architecture section

fields.label: Architecture Description
fields.name: architecture_description
fields.instructions: Description for the architecture section
fields.default_value: ChainThat's Beyond Policy Administration Platform technology architecture leverages cloud-native container technology and a SaaS model with robust security, API-driven integration, and flexible access to ensure scalability, seamless integration, and comprehensive business insights.

fields.label: Architecture Image
fields.name: architecture_image
fields.instructions: Image for the architecture section

fields.label: Architecture Features
fields.name: architecture_features
fields.instructions: Add architecture features

sub_fields.label: Feature Title
sub_fields.name: feature_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title of the architecture feature

sub_fields.label: Feature Description
sub_fields.name: feature_description
sub_fields.instructions: Description of the architecture feature

fields.label: Industry Title
fields.name: industry_title
fields.instructions: Title for the industry support section

fields.label: Industry Subtitle
fields.name: industry_subtitle
fields.instructions: Subtitle for the industry support section

fields.label: Industry Button Text
fields.name: industry_button_text
fields.instructions: Text for the industry button

fields.label: Industry Button Link
fields.name: industry_button_link
fields.instructions: Select a page, post, or enter external URL for the industry button

fields.label: Testimonials Title
fields.name: testimonials_title
fields.instructions: Title for the testimonials section

fields.label: Testimonials Subtitle
fields.name: testimonials_subtitle
fields.instructions: Subtitle for the testimonials section
fields.default_value: We have a clear purpose at ChainThat to develop technology platforms that activate agility in insurance organisations, enabling them to realise their full business potential. Our dedicated team work hard to help our clients drive their competitive advantage and gain market share.

fields.label: Select Case Studies / News / Solutions
fields.name: testimonials_items
fields.instructions: Select case studies, news articles, or solutions to display as testimonials (will alternate image/content layout)

fields.label: Bottom CTA Title
fields.name: bottom_cta_title
fields.instructions: Title for the bottom CTA section

fields.label: Bottom CTA Description
fields.name: bottom_cta_description
fields.instructions: Description for the bottom CTA section
fields.default_value: We have a clear purpose at ChainThat to develop technology platforms that activate agility in insurance organisations, enabling them to realise their full business potential. Our dedicated team work hard to help our clients drive their competitive advantage and gain market share.

fields.label: Bottom Buttons
fields.name: bottom_buttons
fields.instructions: Bottom section buttons

sub_fields.label: Bottom Button 1 Text
sub_fields.name: bottom_button1_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text for the first bottom button

sub_fields.label: Bottom Button 1 Link
sub_fields.name: bottom_button1_link
sub_fields.instructions: Select a page, post, or enter external URL for the first bottom button

sub_fields.label: Bottom Button 2 Text
sub_fields.name: bottom_button2_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text for the second bottom button

sub_fields.label: Bottom Button 2 Link
sub_fields.name: bottom_button2_link
sub_fields.instructions: Select a page, post, or enter external URL for the second bottom button

description: ACF fields for platform custom post type
